text: Otogizﾅ行hi are a group of short stories with pictures, written in Japan, mostly in the period between 1392 and 1573. There are about 350 of these stories. They are about many different things: love, religion, fighting, humor, and other things. The otogizﾅ行hi were often read to an audience. ==Other websites== *Online edition of the Otogizﾅ行hi at Kyoto University Category:Japanese mythology Category:Japanese folklore
title: Otogizﾅ行hi
